DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether body weight supported treadmill training is more effective than traditional physical therapy at restoring gait in persons recovering from traumatic brain injury.
DOC.brief_title: Physical Work Capacity After Traumatic Brain Injury
DOC.criteria: traumatic brain injury follow two step commands between 18 and 60 years old between 3 and 36 months post injury known cardiovascular disease uncooperative, behavioral challenges
DOC.keyword: require manual assistance or walking aids to walk
able to follow two step commands
